Body:
package = PackageDescription.from_string(BENTO_INFO)
global_context = prepare_package(self.top_node, BENTO_INFO)
conf, configure = prepare_command(global_context, 'configure', [], package,
    self.top_node)
run_command_in_context(conf, configure)
pre_hook = PreHookWrapper(hook_func, self.build_node.path_from(self.
    top_node), self.top_node.abspath())
bld, build = prepare_command(global_context, 'build', [], package, self.
    top_node)
run_command_in_context(bld, build, pre_hooks=[pre_hook])
return bld
